high_descs: Turn around, move to the counter.
Pick up the candle on the counter.
Turn around, bring the candle to the toilet.
Put the candle on the toilet tank lid.
anns.task_desc: Put a candle on the toilet tank lid.

high_descs: Move to the back of the room facing the right sink
Pick up the candle stick on top of the counter by the sink
Carry the candle over to the back of the toilet
Place the candle on top of the toilet tank on the far left corner
anns.task_desc: Move a candle to the toilet

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the counter between the sinks ahead.
Grab the candle beside the spray bottle on the counter between the sinks.
Turn around to face the toilet behind you.
Place the candle on top of the toilet.
anns.task_desc: Place a candle on top of the toilet.
